00072 struct IslandStitchData;
00073 
00074 /* This is a straightforward implementation, count the uv's in the island that will move and take the mean displacement/rotation and apply it to all
00075  * elements of the island except from the stitchable */
00076 typedef struct IslandStitchData {
00077     /* rotation can be used only for edges, for vertices there is no such notion */
00078     float rotation;
00079     float translation[2];
00080     /* Used for rotation, the island will rotate around this point */
00081     float medianPoint[2];
00082     int numOfElements;
00083     int num_rot_elements;
00084     /* flag to remember if island has been added for preview */
00085     char addedForPreview;
00086     /* flag an island to be considered for determining static island */
00087     char stitchableCandidate;
00088     /* if edge rotation is used, flag so that vertex rotation is not used */
00089     char use_edge_rotation;
00090 } IslandStitchData;
00091 
00092 /* just for averaging UVs */
00093 typedef struct UVVertAverage {
00094     float uv[2];
00095     unsigned short count;
00096 } UVVertAverage;
00097 
00098 typedef struct UvEdge {
00099     /* index to uv buffer */
00100     unsigned int uv1;
00101     unsigned int uv2;
00102     /* general use flag (Used to check if edge is boundary here, and propagates to adjacency elements) */
00103     char flag;
00104     /* element that guarantees element->face has the face on element->tfindex and element->tfindex+1 is the second uv */
00105     UvElement *element;
00106 } UvEdge;

00109 /* stitch state object */
00110 typedef struct StitchState {
00111     /* use limit flag */
00112     char use_limit;
00113     /* limit to operator, same as original operator */
00114     float limit_dist;
00115     /* snap uv islands together during stitching */
00116     char snap_islands;
00117     /* stich at midpoints or at islands */
00118     char midpoints;
00119     /* editmesh, cached for use in modal handler */
00120     BMEditMesh *em;
00121     /* element map for getting info about uv connectivity */
00122     UvElementMap *element_map;
00123     /* edge container */
00124     UvEdge *uvedges;
00125     /* container of first of a group of coincident uvs, these will be operated upon */
00126     UvElement **uvs;
00127     /* maps uvelements to their first coincident uv */
00128     int *map;
00129     /* 2D normals per uv to calculate rotation for snapping */
00130     float *normals;
00131     /* edge storage */
00132     UvEdge *edges;
00133 
00134     /* count of separate uvs and edges */
00135     int total_boundary_edges;
00136     int total_separate_uvs;
00137     /* hold selection related information */
00138     UvElement **selection_stack;
00139     int selection_size;
00140     /* island that stays in place */
00141     int static_island;
00142     /* store number of primitives per face so that we can allocate the active island buffer later */
00143     unsigned int *tris_per_island;
00144 } StitchState;

00164 /* constructor */
00165 static StitchPreviewer *stitch_preview_init(void)
00166 {
00167     _stitch_preview = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(StitchPreviewer), "stitch_previewer");
00168     _stitch_preview->preview_polys = NULL;
00169     _stitch_preview->preview_stitchable = NULL;
00170     _stitch_preview->preview_unstitchable = NULL;
00171     _stitch_preview->uvs_per_polygon = NULL;
00172 
00173     _stitch_preview->preview_uvs = 0;
00174     _stitch_preview->num_polys = 0;
00175     _stitch_preview->num_stitchable = 0;
00176     _stitch_preview->num_unstitchable = 0;
00177 
00178     _stitch_preview->static_tris = NULL;
00179 
00180     _stitch_preview->num_static_tris = 0;
00181 
00182     return _stitch_preview;
00183 }
00184 
00185 /* destructor...yeah this should be C++ :) */
00186 static void stitch_preview_delete(void)
00187 {
00188     if (_stitch_preview) {
00189         if (_stitch_preview->preview_polys) {
00190             MEM_freeN(_stitch_preview->preview_polys);
00191             _stitch_preview->preview_polys = NULL;
00192         }
00193         if (_stitch_preview->uvs_per_polygon) {
00194             MEM_freeN(_stitch_preview->uvs_per_polygon);
00195             _stitch_preview->uvs_per_polygon = NULL;
00196         }
00197         if (_stitch_preview->preview_stitchable) {
00198             MEM_freeN(_stitch_preview->preview_stitchable);
00199             _stitch_preview->preview_stitchable = NULL;
00200         }
00201         if (_stitch_preview->preview_unstitchable) {
00202             MEM_freeN(_stitch_preview->preview_unstitchable);
00203             _stitch_preview->preview_unstitchable = NULL;
00204         }
00205         if (_stitch_preview->static_tris) {
00206             MEM_freeN(_stitch_preview->static_tris);
00207             _stitch_preview->static_tris = NULL;
00208         }
00209 
00210         MEM_freeN(_stitch_preview);
00211         _stitch_preview = NULL;
00212     }
00213 }

00224 /* This function updates the header of the UV editor when the stitch tool updates its settings */
00225 static void stitch_update_header(StitchState *stitch_state, bContext *C)
00226 {
00227     static char str[] = "(S)nap %s, (M)idpoints %s, (L)imit %.2f (Alt Wheel adjust) %s, Switch (I)sland, shift select vertices";
00228 
00229     char msg[HEADER_LENGTH];
00230     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00231 
00232     if (sa) {
00233         BLI_snprintf(msg, HEADER_LENGTH, str,
00234                      stitch_state->snap_islands ? "On" : "Off",
00235                      stitch_state->midpoints    ? "On" : "Off",
00236                      stitch_state->limit_dist,
00237                      stitch_state->use_limit    ? "On" : "Off");
00238 
00239         ED_area_headerprint(sa, msg);
00240     }
00241 }

00243 static int getNumOfIslandUvs(UvElementMap *elementMap, int island)
00244 {
00245     if (island == elementMap->totalIslands - 1) {
00246         return elementMap->totalUVs - elementMap->islandIndices[island];
00247     }
00248     else {
00249         return elementMap->islandIndices[island + 1] - elementMap->islandIndices[island];
00250     }
00251 }
00252 
00253 static void stitch_uv_rotate(float rotation, float medianPoint[2], float uv[2])
00254 {
00255     float uv_rotation_result[2];
00256 
00257     uv[0] -= medianPoint[0];
00258     uv[1] -= medianPoint[1];
00259 
00260     uv_rotation_result[0] = cos(rotation) * uv[0] - sin(rotation) * uv[1];
00261     uv_rotation_result[1] = sin(rotation) * uv[0] + cos(rotation) * uv[1];
00262 
00263     uv[0] = uv_rotation_result[0] + medianPoint[0];
00264     uv[1] = uv_rotation_result[1] + medianPoint[1];
00265 }
00266 
00267 static int stitch_check_uvs_stitchable(UvElement *element, UvElement *element_iter, StitchState *state)
00268 {
00269     float limit;
00270     int do_limit;
00271 
00272     if (element_iter == element) {
00273         return 0;
00274     }
00275 
00276     limit = state->limit_dist;
00277     do_limit = state->use_limit;
00278 
00279     if (do_limit) {
00280         MLoopUV *luv_orig, *luv_iter;
00281         BMLoop *l_orig, *l_iter;
00282 
00283 
00284         l_orig = element->l;
00285         luv_orig = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, l_orig->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00286         l_iter = element_iter->l;
00287         luv_iter = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, l_iter->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00288 
00289         if (fabs(luv_orig->uv[0] - luv_iter->uv[0]) < limit &&
00290             fabs(luv_orig->uv[1] - luv_iter->uv[1]) < limit)
00291         {
00292             return 1;
00293         }
00294         else {
00295             return 0;
00296         }
00297     }
00298     else {
00299         return 1;
00300     }
00301 }
00302 
00303 
00304 static int stitch_check_uvs_state_stitchable(UvElement *element, UvElement *element_iter, StitchState *state)
00305 {
00306     if ((state->snap_islands && element->island == element_iter->island) ||
00307         (!state->midpoints && element->island == element_iter->island))
00308     {
00309         return 0;
00310     }
00311 
00312     return stitch_check_uvs_stitchable(element, element_iter, state);
00313 }

00315 
00316 /* calculate snapping for islands */
00317 static void stitch_calculate_island_snapping(StitchState *state, PreviewPosition *preview_position, StitchPreviewer *preview, IslandStitchData *island_stitch_data, int final)
00318 {
00319     int i;
00320     UvElement *element;
00321 
00322     for (i = 0; i <  state->element_map->totalIslands; i++) {
00323         if (island_stitch_data[i].addedForPreview) {
00324             int numOfIslandUVs = 0, j;
00325 
00326             /* check to avoid divide by 0 */
00327             if (island_stitch_data[i].num_rot_elements > 0) {
00328                 island_stitch_data[i].rotation /= island_stitch_data[i].num_rot_elements;
00329                 island_stitch_data[i].medianPoint[0] /= island_stitch_data[i].numOfElements;
00330                 island_stitch_data[i].medianPoint[1] /= island_stitch_data[i].numOfElements;
00331             }
00332             island_stitch_data[i].translation[0] /= island_stitch_data[i].numOfElements;
00333             island_stitch_data[i].translation[1] /= island_stitch_data[i].numOfElements;
00334             numOfIslandUVs = getNumOfIslandUvs(state->element_map, i);
00335             element = &state->element_map->buf[state->element_map->islandIndices[i]];
00336             for (j = 0; j < numOfIslandUVs; j++, element++) {
00337                 /* stitchable uvs have already been processed, don't process */
00338                 if (!(element->flag & STITCH_PROCESSED)) {
00339                     MLoopUV *luv;
00340                     BMLoop *l;
00341 
00342                     l = element->l;
00343                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00344 
00345                     if (final) {
00346 
00347                         stitch_uv_rotate(island_stitch_data[i].rotation, island_stitch_data[i].medianPoint, luv->uv);
00348 
00349                         add_v2_v2(luv->uv, island_stitch_data[i].translation);
00350                     }
00351 
00352                     else {
00353                         int face_preview_pos = preview_position[BM_elem_index_get(element->face)].data_position;
00354 
00355                         stitch_uv_rotate(island_stitch_data[i].rotation, island_stitch_data[i].medianPoint,
00356                                          preview->preview_polys + face_preview_pos + 2 * element->tfindex);
00357 
00358                         add_v2_v2(preview->preview_polys + face_preview_pos + 2 * element->tfindex,
00359                                   island_stitch_data[i].translation);
00360                     }
00361                 }
00362                 /* cleanup */
00363                 element->flag &= STITCH_SELECTED;
00364             }
00365         }
00366     }
00367 }

00370 
00371 static void stitch_island_calculate_edge_rotation(UvEdge *edge, StitchState *state, UVVertAverage *uv_average, unsigned int *uvfinal_map, IslandStitchData *island_stitch_data)
00372 {
00373     UvElement *element1, *element2;
00374     float uv1[2], uv2[2];
00375     float edgecos, edgesin;
00376     int index1, index2;
00377     float rotation;
00378     MLoopUV *luv1, *luv2;
00379     BMLoop *l1, *l2;
00380 
00381     element1 = state->uvs[edge->uv1];
00382     element2 = state->uvs[edge->uv2];
00383 
00384     l1 = element1->l;
00385     luv1 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, l1->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00386     l2 = element2->l;
00387     luv2 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, l2->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00388 
00389     index1 = uvfinal_map[element1 - state->element_map->buf];
00390     index2 = uvfinal_map[element2 - state->element_map->buf];
00391 
00392     /* the idea here is to take the directions of the edges and find the rotation between final and initial
00393      * direction. This, using inner and outer vector products, gives the angle. Directions are differences so... */
00394     uv1[0] = luv2->uv[0] - luv1->uv[0];
00395     uv1[1] = luv2->uv[1] - luv1->uv[1];
00396 
00397     uv2[0] = uv_average[index2].uv[0] - uv_average[index1].uv[0];
00398     uv2[1] = uv_average[index2].uv[1] - uv_average[index1].uv[1];
00399 
00400     normalize_v2(uv1);
00401     normalize_v2(uv2);
00402 
00403     edgecos = uv1[0] * uv2[0] + uv1[1] * uv2[1];
00404     edgesin = uv1[0] * uv2[1] - uv2[0] * uv1[1];
00405 
00406     rotation = (edgesin > 0) ? acos(MAX2(-1.0, MIN2(1.0, edgecos))) : -acos(MAX2(-1.0, MIN2(1.0, edgecos)));
00407 
00408     island_stitch_data[element1->island].num_rot_elements++;
00409     island_stitch_data[element1->island].rotation += rotation;
00410 }
00411 
00412 
00413 static void stitch_island_calculate_vert_rotation(UvElement *element, StitchState *state, IslandStitchData *island_stitch_data)
00414 {
00415     float edgecos = 1, edgesin = 0;
00416     int index;
00417     UvElement *element_iter;
00418     float rotation = 0;
00419     BMLoop *l;
00420 
00421     if (element->island == state->static_island && !state->midpoints)
00422         return;
00423 
00424     l = element->l;
00425 
00426     index = BM_elem_index_get(l->v);
00427 
00428     element_iter = state->element_map->vert[index];
00429 
00430     for (; element_iter; element_iter = element_iter->next) {
00431         if (element_iter->separate && stitch_check_uvs_state_stitchable(element, element_iter, state)) {
00432             int index_tmp1, index_tmp2;
00433             float normal[2];
00434             /* easily possible*/
00435 
00436             index_tmp1 = element_iter - state->element_map->buf;
00437             index_tmp1 = state->map[index_tmp1];
00438             index_tmp2 = element - state->element_map->buf;
00439             index_tmp2 = state->map[index_tmp2];
00440 
00441             negate_v2_v2(normal, state->normals + index_tmp2 * 2);
00442             edgecos = dot_v2v2(normal, state->normals + index_tmp1 * 2);
00443             edgesin = cross_v2v2(normal, state->normals + index_tmp1 * 2);
00444             rotation += (edgesin > 0) ? acos(edgecos) : -acos(edgecos);
00445         }
00446     }
00447 
00448     if (state->midpoints)
00449         rotation /= 2.0;
00450     island_stitch_data[element->island].num_rot_elements++;
00451     island_stitch_data[element->island].rotation += rotation;
00452 }

00455 static void stitch_state_delete(StitchState *stitch_state)
00456 {
00457     if (stitch_state) {
00458         if (stitch_state->element_map) {
00459             EDBM_uv_element_map_free(stitch_state->element_map);
00460         }
00461         if (stitch_state->uvs) {
00462             MEM_freeN(stitch_state->uvs);
00463         }
00464         if (stitch_state->selection_stack) {
00465             MEM_freeN(stitch_state->selection_stack);
00466         }
00467         if (stitch_state->tris_per_island) {
00468             MEM_freeN(stitch_state->tris_per_island);
00469         }
00470         if (stitch_state->map) {
00471             MEM_freeN(stitch_state->map);
00472         }
00473         if (stitch_state->normals) {
00474             MEM_freeN(stitch_state->normals);
00475         }
00476         if (stitch_state->edges) {
00477             MEM_freeN(stitch_state->edges);
00478         }
00479         MEM_freeN(stitch_state);
00480     }
00481 }

00485 /* checks for remote uvs that may be stitched with a certain uv, flags them if stitchable. */
00486 static void determine_uv_stitchability(UvElement *element, StitchState *state, IslandStitchData *island_stitch_data)
00487 {
00488     int vert_index;
00489     UvElement *element_iter;
00490     BMLoop *l;
00491 
00492     l = element->l;
00493 
00494     vert_index = BM_elem_index_get(l->v);
00495     element_iter = state->element_map->vert[vert_index];
00496 
00497     for (; element_iter; element_iter = element_iter->next) {
00498         if (element_iter->separate) {
00499             if (element_iter == element) {
00500                 continue;
00501             }
00502             if (stitch_check_uvs_stitchable(element, element_iter, state)) {
00503                 island_stitch_data[element_iter->island].stitchableCandidate = 1;
00504                 island_stitch_data[element->island].stitchableCandidate = 1;
00505                 element->flag |= STITCH_STITCHABLE_CANDIDATE;
00506             }
00507         }
00508     }
00509 }

00511 
00512 /* set preview buffer position of UV face in editface->tmp.l */
00513 static void stitch_set_face_preview_buffer_position(BMFace *efa, StitchPreviewer *preview, PreviewPosition *preview_position)
00514 {
00515     int index = BM_elem_index_get(efa);
00516 
00517     if (preview_position[index].data_position == STITCH_NO_PREVIEW) {
00518         preview_position[index].data_position = preview->preview_uvs * 2;
00519         preview_position[index].polycount_position = preview->num_polys++;
00520         preview->preview_uvs += efa->len;
00521     }
00522 }
00523 
00524 
00525 /* setup face preview for all coincident uvs and their faces */
00526 static void stitch_setup_face_preview_for_uv_group(UvElement *element, StitchState *state, IslandStitchData *island_stitch_data,
00527                                                    PreviewPosition *preview_position) {
00528     StitchPreviewer *preview = uv_get_stitch_previewer();
00529 
00530     /* static island does not change so returning immediately */
00531     if (state->snap_islands && !state->midpoints && state->static_island == element->island)
00532         return;
00533 
00534     if (state->snap_islands) {
00535         island_stitch_data[element->island].addedForPreview = 1;
00536     }
00537 
00538     do {
00539         stitch_set_face_preview_buffer_position(element->face, preview, preview_position);
00540         element = element->next;
00541     } while (element && !element->separate);
00542 }
00543 
00544 
00545 /* checks if uvs are indeed stitchable and registers so that they can be shown in preview */
00546 static void stitch_validate_stichability(UvElement *element, StitchState *state, IslandStitchData *island_stitch_data,
00547                                          PreviewPosition *preview_position) {
00548     UvElement *element_iter;
00549     StitchPreviewer *preview;
00550     int vert_index;
00551     BMLoop *l;
00552 
00553     l = element->l;
00554 
00555     vert_index = BM_elem_index_get(l->v);
00556 
00557     preview = uv_get_stitch_previewer();
00558     element_iter = state->element_map->vert[vert_index];
00559 
00560     for (; element_iter; element_iter = element_iter->next) {
00561         if (element_iter->separate) {
00562             if (element_iter == element)
00563                 continue;
00564             if (stitch_check_uvs_state_stitchable(element, element_iter, state)) {
00565                 if ((element_iter->island == state->static_island) || (element->island == state->static_island)) {
00566                     element->flag |= STITCH_STITCHABLE;
00567                     preview->num_stitchable++;
00568                     stitch_setup_face_preview_for_uv_group(element, state, island_stitch_data, preview_position);
00569                     return;
00570                 }
00571             }
00572         }
00573     }
00574 
00575     /* this can happen if the uvs to be stitched are not on a stitchable island */
00576     if (!(element->flag & STITCH_STITCHABLE)) {
00577         preview->num_unstitchable++;
00578     }
00579 }
00580 
00581 /* main processing function. It calculates preview and final positions. */
00582 static int stitch_process_data(StitchState *state, Scene *scene, int final)
00583 {
00584     int i;
00585     StitchPreviewer *preview;
00586     IslandStitchData *island_stitch_data = NULL;
00587     int previous_island = state->static_island;
00588     BMFace *efa;
00589     BMIter iter;
00590     UVVertAverage *final_position;
00591     char stitch_midpoints = state->midpoints;
00592     /* used to map uv indices to uvaverage indices for selection */
00593     unsigned int *uvfinal_map;
00594     /* per face preview position in preview buffer */
00595     PreviewPosition *preview_position;
00596 
00597     /* cleanup previous preview */
00598     stitch_preview_delete();
00599     preview = stitch_preview_init();
00600     if (preview == NULL)
00601         return 0;
00602 
00603     preview_position = MEM_mallocN(state->em->bm->totface * sizeof(*preview_position), "stitch_face_preview_position");
00604     /* each face holds its position in the preview buffer in tmp. -1 is uninitialized */
00605     for (i = 0; i < state->em->bm->totface; i++) {
00606         preview_position[i].data_position = STITCH_NO_PREVIEW;
00607     }
00608 
00609     island_stitch_data = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*island_stitch_data) * state->element_map->totalIslands, "stitch_island_data");
00610     if (!island_stitch_data) {
00611         return 0;
00612     }
00613 
00614     /* store indices to editVerts and Faces. May be unneeded but ensuring anyway */
00615     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(state->em->bm, BM_VERT | BM_FACE);
00616 
00617     /*****************************************
00618      *  First determine stitchability of uvs *
00619      *****************************************/
00620 
00621     for (i = 0; i < state->selection_size; i++) {
00622         UvElement *element = state->selection_stack[i];
00623         determine_uv_stitchability(element, state, island_stitch_data);
00624     }
00625 
00626     /* set static island to one that is added for preview */
00627     state->static_island %= state->element_map->totalIslands;
00628     while (!(island_stitch_data[state->static_island].stitchableCandidate)) {
00629         state->static_island++;
00630         state->static_island %= state->element_map->totalIslands;
00631         /* this is entirely possible if for example limit stitching with no stitchable verts or no selection */
00632         if (state->static_island == previous_island)
00633             break;
00634     }
00635 
00636     for (i = 0; i < state->selection_size; i++) {
00637         UvElement *element = state->selection_stack[i];
00638         if (element->flag & STITCH_STITCHABLE_CANDIDATE) {
00639             element->flag &= ~STITCH_STITCHABLE_CANDIDATE;
00640             stitch_validate_stichability(element, state, island_stitch_data, preview_position);
00641         }
00642         else {
00643             /* add to preview for unstitchable */
00644             preview->num_unstitchable++;
00645         }
00646     }
00647 
00648     /*****************************************
00649      *  Setup preview for stitchable islands *
00650      *****************************************/
00651     if (state->snap_islands) {
00652         for (i = 0; i <  state->element_map->totalIslands; i++) {
00653             if (island_stitch_data[i].addedForPreview) {
00654                 int numOfIslandUVs = 0, j;
00655                 UvElement *element;
00656                 numOfIslandUVs = getNumOfIslandUvs(state->element_map, i);
00657                 element = &state->element_map->buf[state->element_map->islandIndices[i]];
00658                 for (j = 0; j < numOfIslandUVs; j++, element++) {
00659                     stitch_set_face_preview_buffer_position(element->face, preview, preview_position);
00660                 }
00661             }
00662         }
00663     }
00664 
00665     /*********************************************************************
00666      * Setup the preview buffers and fill them with the appropriate data *
00667      *********************************************************************/
00668     if (!final) {
00669         BMIter liter;
00670         BMLoop *l;
00671         MLoopUV *luv;
00672         unsigned int buffer_index = 0;
00673         int stitchBufferIndex = 0, unstitchBufferIndex = 0;
00674         /* initialize the preview buffers */
00675         preview->preview_polys = (float *)MEM_mallocN(preview->preview_uvs * sizeof(float) * 2, "tri_uv_stitch_prev");
00676         preview->uvs_per_polygon = MEM_mallocN(preview->num_polys * sizeof(*preview->uvs_per_polygon), "tri_uv_stitch_prev");
00677         preview->preview_stitchable = (float *)MEM_mallocN(preview->num_stitchable * sizeof(float) * 2, "stitch_preview_stichable_data");
00678         preview->preview_unstitchable = (float *)MEM_mallocN(preview->num_unstitchable * sizeof(float) * 2, "stitch_preview_unstichable_data");
00679 
00680         preview->static_tris = (float *)MEM_mallocN(state->tris_per_island[state->static_island] * sizeof(float) * 6, "static_island_preview_tris");
00681 
00682         preview->num_static_tris = state->tris_per_island[state->static_island];
00683         /* will cause cancel and freeing of all data structures so OK */
00684         if (!preview->preview_polys || !preview->preview_stitchable || !preview->preview_unstitchable) {
00685             return 0;
00686         }
00687 
00688         /* copy data from MTFaces to the preview display buffers */
00689         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, state->em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00690             /* just to test if face was added for processing. uvs of inselected vertices will return NULL */
00691             UvElement *element = ED_uv_element_get(state->element_map, efa, BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(efa));
00692 
00693             if (element) {
00694                 int numoftris = efa->len - 2;
00695                 int index = BM_elem_index_get(efa);
00696                 int face_preview_pos = preview_position[index].data_position;
00697                 if (face_preview_pos != STITCH_NO_PREVIEW) {
00698                     preview->uvs_per_polygon[preview_position[index].polycount_position] = efa->len;
00699                     BM_ITER_ELEM_INDEX (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, i) {
00700                         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00701                         copy_v2_v2(preview->preview_polys + face_preview_pos + i * 2, luv->uv);
00702                     }
00703                 }
00704 
00705                 if (element->island == state->static_island) {
00706                     BMLoop *fl = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(efa);
00707                     MLoopUV *fuv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, fl->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00708 
00709                     BM_ITER_ELEM_INDEX (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, i) {
00710                         if (i < numoftris) {
00711                             /* using next since the first uv is already accounted for */
00712                             BMLoop *lnext = l->next;
00713                             MLoopUV *luvnext = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, lnext->next->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00714                             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, lnext->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00715 
00716                             memcpy(preview->static_tris + buffer_index, fuv->uv, 2 * sizeof(float));
00717                             memcpy(preview->static_tris + buffer_index + 2, luv->uv, 2 * sizeof(float));
00718                             memcpy(preview->static_tris + buffer_index + 4, luvnext->uv, 2 * sizeof(float));
00719                             buffer_index += 6;
00720                         }
00721                         else {
00722                             break;
00723                         }
00724                     }
00725                 }
00726             }
00727         }
00728 
00729         /* fill the appropriate preview buffers */
00730         for (i = 0; i < state->total_separate_uvs; i++) {
00731             UvElement *element = (UvElement *)state->uvs[i];
00732             if (element->flag & STITCH_STITCHABLE) {
00733                 l = element->l;
00734                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00735 
00736                 copy_v2_v2(&preview->preview_stitchable[stitchBufferIndex * 2], luv->uv);
00737 
00738                 stitchBufferIndex++;
00739             }
00740             else if (element->flag & STITCH_SELECTED) {
00741                 l = element->l;
00742                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00743 
00744                 copy_v2_v2(&preview->preview_unstitchable[unstitchBufferIndex * 2], luv->uv);
00745                 unstitchBufferIndex++;
00746             }
00747         }
00748     }
00749 
00750     /******************************************************
00751      * Here we calculate the final coordinates of the uvs *
00752      ******************************************************/
00753 
00754     final_position = MEM_callocN(state->selection_size * sizeof(*final_position), "stitch_uv_average");
00755     uvfinal_map = MEM_mallocN(state->element_map->totalUVs * sizeof(*uvfinal_map), "stitch_uv_final_map");
00756 
00757     /* first pass, calculate final position for stitchable uvs of the static island */
00758     for (i = 0; i < state->selection_size; i++) {
00759         UvElement *element = state->selection_stack[i];
00760         if (element->flag & STITCH_STITCHABLE) {
00761             BMLoop *l;
00762             MLoopUV *luv;
00763             UvElement *element_iter;
00764 
00765             l = element->l;
00766             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00767 
00768 
00769             uvfinal_map[element - state->element_map->buf] = i;
00770 
00771             copy_v2_v2(final_position[i].uv, luv->uv);
00772             final_position[i].count = 1;
00773 
00774             if (state->snap_islands && element->island == state->static_island && !stitch_midpoints)
00775                 continue;
00776 
00777             element_iter = state->element_map->vert[BM_elem_index_get(l->v)];
00778 
00779             for ( ; element_iter; element_iter = element_iter->next) {
00780                 if (element_iter->separate) {
00781                     if (stitch_check_uvs_state_stitchable(element, element_iter, state)) {
00782                         l = element_iter->l;
00783                         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00784                         if (stitch_midpoints) {
00785                             add_v2_v2(final_position[i].uv, luv->uv);
00786                             final_position[i].count++;
00787                         }
00788                         else if (element_iter->island == state->static_island) {
00789                             /* if multiple uvs on the static island exist,
00790                              * last checked remains. to disambiguate we need to limit or use
00791                              * edge stitch */
00792                             copy_v2_v2(final_position[i].uv, luv->uv);
00793                         }
00794                     }
00795                 }
00796             }
00797         }
00798         if (stitch_midpoints) {
00799             final_position[i].uv[0] /= final_position[i].count;
00800             final_position[i].uv[1] /= final_position[i].count;
00801         }
00802     }
00803 
00804     /* second pass, calculate island rotation and translation before modifying any uvs */
00805     if (state->snap_islands) {
00806         for (i = 0; i < state->selection_size; i++) {
00807             UvElement *element = state->selection_stack[i];
00808             if (element->flag & STITCH_STITCHABLE) {
00809                 BMLoop *l;
00810                 MLoopUV *luv;
00811 
00812                 l = element->l;
00813                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00814 
00815                 /* accumulate each islands' translation from stitchable elements. it is important to do here
00816                  * because in final pass MTFaces get modified and result is zero. */
00817                 island_stitch_data[element->island].translation[0] += final_position[i].uv[0] - luv->uv[0];
00818                 island_stitch_data[element->island].translation[1] += final_position[i].uv[1] - luv->uv[1];
00819                 island_stitch_data[element->island].medianPoint[0] += luv->uv[0];
00820                 island_stitch_data[element->island].medianPoint[1] += luv->uv[1];
00821                 island_stitch_data[element->island].numOfElements++;
00822             }
00823         }
00824 
00825         /* only calculate rotation when an edge has been fully selected */
00826         for (i = 0; i < state->total_boundary_edges; i++) {
00827             UvEdge *edge = state->edges + i;
00828             if ((state->uvs[edge->uv1]->flag & STITCH_STITCHABLE) && (state->uvs[edge->uv2]->flag & STITCH_STITCHABLE)) {
00829                 stitch_island_calculate_edge_rotation(edge, state, final_position, uvfinal_map, island_stitch_data);
00830                 island_stitch_data[state->uvs[edge->uv1]->island].use_edge_rotation = 1;
00831             }
00832         }
00833 
00834         for (i = 0; i < state->selection_size; i++) {
00835             UvElement *element = state->selection_stack[i];
00836             if (!island_stitch_data[element->island].use_edge_rotation) {
00837                 if (element->flag & STITCH_STITCHABLE) {
00838                     stitch_island_calculate_vert_rotation(element, state, island_stitch_data);
00839                 }
00840             }
00841         }
00842 
00843     }
00844 
00845     /* third pass, propagate changes to coincident uvs */
00846     for (i = 0; i < state->selection_size; i++) {
00847         UvElement *element = state->selection_stack[i];
00848         if (element->flag & STITCH_STITCHABLE) {
00849             UvElement *element_iter = element;
00850             /* propagate to coincident uvs */
00851             do {
00852                 BMLoop *l;
00853                 MLoopUV *luv;
00854 
00855                 l = element_iter->l;
00856                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&state->em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00857 
00858                 element_iter->flag |= STITCH_PROCESSED;
00859                 /* either flush to preview or to the MTFace, if final */
00860                 if (final) {
00861                     copy_v2_v2(luv->uv, final_position[i].uv);
00862 
00863                     uvedit_uv_select_enable(state->em, scene, l, FALSE);
00864                 }
00865                 else {
00866                     int face_preview_pos = preview_position[BM_elem_index_get(element_iter->face)].data_position;
00867                     if (face_preview_pos != STITCH_NO_PREVIEW) {
00868                         copy_v2_v2(preview->preview_polys + face_preview_pos + 2 * element_iter->tfindex,
00869                                    final_position[i].uv);
00870                     }
00871                 }
00872 
00873                 /* end of calculations, keep only the selection flag */
00874                 if ( (!state->snap_islands) || ((!stitch_midpoints) && (element_iter->island == state->static_island))) {
00875                     element_iter->flag &= STITCH_SELECTED;
00876                 }
00877 
00878                 element_iter = element_iter->next;
00879             } while (element_iter && !element_iter->separate);
00880         }
00881     }
00882 
00883     /* final pass, calculate Island translation/rotation if needed */
00884     if (state->snap_islands) {
00885         stitch_calculate_island_snapping(state, preview_position, preview, island_stitch_data, final);
00886     }
00887 
00888     MEM_freeN(final_position);
00889     MEM_freeN(uvfinal_map);
00890     MEM_freeN(island_stitch_data);
00891     MEM_freeN(preview_position);
00892 
00893     return 1;
00894 }
00895 
00896 /* Stitch hash initialization functions */
00897 static unsigned int uv_edge_hash(const void *key)
00898 {
00899     UvEdge *edge = (UvEdge *)key;
00900     return
00901         BLI_ghashutil_inthash(SET_INT_IN_POINTER(edge->uv2)) +
00902         BLI_ghashutil_inthash(SET_INT_IN_POINTER(edge->uv1));
00903 }
00904 
00905 static int uv_edge_compare(const void *a, const void *b)
00906 {
00907     UvEdge *edge1 = (UvEdge *)a;
00908     UvEdge *edge2 = (UvEdge *)b;
00909 
00910     if ((edge1->uv1 == edge2->uv1) && (edge1->uv2 == edge2->uv2)) {
00911         return 0;
00912     }
00913     return 1;
00914 }
00915 
00916 
00917 /* Select all common uvs */
00918 static void stitch_select_uv(UvElement *element, StitchState *state, int always_select)
00919 {
00920     BMLoop *l;
00921     UvElement *element_iter;
00922     UvElement **selection_stack = state->selection_stack;
00923 
00924     l = element->l;
00925 
00926     element_iter = state->element_map->vert[BM_elem_index_get(l->v)];
00927     /* first deselect all common uvs */
00928     for (; element_iter; element_iter = element_iter->next) {
00929         if (element_iter->separate) {
00930             /* only separators go to selection */
00931             if (element_iter->flag & STITCH_SELECTED) {
00932                 int i;
00933                 if (always_select)
00934                     continue;
00935 
00936                 element_iter->flag &= ~STITCH_SELECTED;
00937                 for (i = 0; i < state->selection_size; i++) {
00938                     if (selection_stack[i] == element_iter) {
00939                         (state->selection_size)--;
00940                         selection_stack[i] = selection_stack[state->selection_size];
00941                         break;
00942                     }
00943                 }
00944             }
00945             else {
00946                 element_iter->flag |= STITCH_SELECTED;
00947                 selection_stack[state->selection_size++] = element_iter;
00948             }
00949         }
00950     }
00951 }
00952 
00953 static void stitch_calculate_edge_normal(BMEditMesh *em, UvEdge *edge, float *normal)
00954 {
00955     BMLoop *l1 = edge->element->l;
00956     BMLoop *l2 = l1->next;
00957     MLoopUV *luv1, *luv2;
00958     float tangent[2];
00959 
00960     luv1 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l1->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00961     luv2 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l2->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00962 
00963     sub_v2_v2v2(tangent, luv2->uv,  luv1->uv);
00964 
00965     normal[0] = tangent[1];
00966     normal[1] = -tangent[0];
00967 
00968     normalize_v2(normal);
00969 }
00970 
00971 static int stitch_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00972 {
00973     /* for fast edge lookup... */
00974     GHash *edgeHash;
00975     /* ...and actual edge storage */
00976     UvEdge *edges;
00977     int total_edges;
00978     /* maps uvelements to their first coincident uv */
00979     int *map;
00980     int counter = 0, i;
00981     BMFace *efa;
00982     BMLoop *l;
00983     BMIter iter, liter;
00984     BMEditMesh *em;
00985     GHashIterator *ghi;
00986     UvEdge *all_edges;
00987     StitchState *state = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(StitchState), "stitch state");
00988     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00989     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00990 
00991     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00992 
00993     op->customdata = state;
00994 
00995     if (!state)
00996         return 0;
00997 
00998     /* initialize state */
00999     state->use_limit = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "use_limit");
01000     state->limit_dist = RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "limit");
01001     state->em = em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
01002     state->snap_islands = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "snap_islands");
01003     state->static_island = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "static_island");
01004     state->midpoints = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "midpoint_snap");
01005     /* in uv synch selection, all uv's are visible */
01006     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
01007         state->element_map = EDBM_uv_element_map_create(state->em, 0, 1);
01008     }
01009     else {
01010         state->element_map = EDBM_uv_element_map_create(state->em, 1, 1);
01011     }
01012     if (!state->element_map) {
01013         stitch_state_delete(state);
01014         return 0;
01015     }
01016 
01017     /* Entirely possible if redoing last operator that static island is bigger than total number of islands.
01018      * This ensures we get no hang in the island checking code in stitch_process_data. */
01019     state->static_island %= state->element_map->totalIslands;
01020 
01021     /* Count 'unique' uvs */
01022     for (i = 0; i < state->element_map->totalUVs; i++) {
01023         if (state->element_map->buf[i].separate) {
01024             counter++;
01025         }
01026     }
01027 
01028     /* Allocate the unique uv buffers */
01029     state->uvs = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*state->uvs) * counter, "uv_stitch_unique_uvs");
01030     /* internal uvs need no normals but it is hard and slow to keep a map of
01031      * normals only for boundary uvs, so allocating for all uvs */
01032     state->normals = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*state->normals) * counter * 2, "uv_stitch_normals");
01033     state->total_separate_uvs = counter;
01034     /* we can at most have totalUVs edges or uvs selected. Actually they are less, considering we store only
01035      * unique uvs for processing but I am accounting for all bizarre cases, especially for edges, this way */
01036     state->selection_stack = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*state->selection_stack) * counter, "uv_stitch_selection_stack");
01037     state->map = map = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*map) * state->element_map->totalUVs, "uv_stitch_unique_map");
01038     /* Allocate the edge stack */
01039     edgeHash = BLI_ghash_new(uv_edge_hash, uv_edge_compare, "stitch_edge_hash");
01040     all_edges = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*all_edges) * state->element_map->totalUVs, "stitch_all_edges");
01041 
01042     if (!state->selection_stack || !state->uvs || !map || !edgeHash || !all_edges) {
01043         stitch_state_delete(state);
01044         return 0;
01045     }
01046 
01047     /* So that we can use this as index for the UvElements */
01048     counter = -1;
01049     /* initialize the unique UVs and map */
01050     for (i = 0; i < em->bm->totvert; i++) {
01051         UvElement *element = state->element_map->vert[i];
01052         for (; element; element = element->next) {
01053             if (element->separate) {
01054                 counter++;
01055                 state->uvs[counter] = element;
01056             }
01057             /* pointer arithmetic to the rescue, as always :)*/
01058             map[element - state->element_map->buf] = counter;
01059         }
01060     }
01061 
01062     counter = 0;
01063     /* Now, on to generate our uv connectivity data */
01064     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01065         if (!(ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) && ((BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) || !BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)))
01066             continue;
01067 
01068         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01069             UvElement *element = ED_uv_element_get(state->element_map, efa, l);
01070             int offset1, itmp1 = element - state->element_map->buf;
01071             int offset2, itmp2 = ED_uv_element_get(state->element_map, efa, l->next) - state->element_map->buf;
01072 
01073             offset1 = map[itmp1];
01074             offset2 = map[itmp2];
01075 
01076             all_edges[counter].flag = 0;
01077             all_edges[counter].element = element;
01078             /* using an order policy, sort uvs according to address space. This avoids
01079              * Having two different UvEdges with the same uvs on different positions  */
01080             if (offset1 < offset2) {
01081                 all_edges[counter].uv1 = offset1;
01082                 all_edges[counter].uv2 = offset2;
01083             }
01084             else {
01085                 all_edges[counter].uv1 = offset2;
01086                 all_edges[counter].uv2 = offset1;
01087             }
01088 
01089             if (BLI_ghash_haskey(edgeHash, &all_edges[counter])) {
01090                 char *flag = BLI_ghash_lookup(edgeHash, &all_edges[counter]);
01091                 *flag = 0;
01092             }
01093             else {
01094                 BLI_ghash_insert(edgeHash, &all_edges[counter], &(all_edges[counter].flag));
01095                 all_edges[counter].flag = STITCH_BOUNDARY;
01096             }
01097             counter++;
01098         }
01099     }
01100 
01101 
01102     ghi = BLI_ghashIterator_new(edgeHash);
01103     total_edges = 0;
01104     /* fill the edges with data */
01105     for (; !BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(ghi); BLI_ghashIterator_step(ghi)) {
01106         UvEdge *edge = ((UvEdge *)BLI_ghashIterator_getKey(ghi));
01107         if (edge->flag & STITCH_BOUNDARY) {
01108             total_edges++;
01109         }
01110     }
01111     state->edges = edges = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*edges) * total_edges, "stitch_edges");
01112     if (!ghi || !edges) {
01113         MEM_freeN(all_edges);
01114         stitch_state_delete(state);
01115         return 0;
01116     }
01117 
01118     state->total_boundary_edges = total_edges;
01119 
01120     /* fill the edges with data */
01121     for (i = 0, BLI_ghashIterator_init(ghi, edgeHash); !BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(ghi); BLI_ghashIterator_step(ghi)) {
01122         UvEdge *edge = ((UvEdge *)BLI_ghashIterator_getKey(ghi));
01123         if (edge->flag & STITCH_BOUNDARY) {
01124             edges[i++] = *((UvEdge *)BLI_ghashIterator_getKey(ghi));
01125         }
01126     }
01127 
01128     /* cleanup temporary stuff */
01129     BLI_ghashIterator_free(ghi);
01130     MEM_freeN(all_edges);
01131 
01132     /* refill hash with new pointers to cleanup duplicates */
01133     BLI_ghash_free(edgeHash, NULL, NULL);
01134 
01135     /***** calculate 2D normals for boundary uvs *****/
01136 
01137     /* we use boundary edges to calculate 2D normals.
01138      * to disambiguate the direction of the normal, we also need
01139      * a point "inside" the island, that can be provided by
01140      * the opposite uv for a quad, or the next uv for a triangle. */
01141 
01142     for (i = 0; i < total_edges; i++) {
01143         float normal[2];
01144         stitch_calculate_edge_normal(em, edges + i, normal);
01145 
01146         add_v2_v2(state->normals + edges[i].uv1 * 2, normal);
01147         add_v2_v2(state->normals + edges[i].uv2 * 2, normal);
01148 
01149         normalize_v2(state->normals + edges[i].uv1 * 2);
01150         normalize_v2(state->normals + edges[i].uv2 * 2);
01151     }
01152 
01153 
01154     /***** fill selection stack *******/
01155 
01156     state->selection_size = 0;
01157 
01158     /* Load old selection if redoing operator with different settings */
01159     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "selection")) {
01160         int faceIndex, elementIndex;
01161         UvElement *element;
01162 
01163         EDBM_index_arrays_init(em, 0, 0, 1);
01164 
01165         RNA_BEGIN(op->ptr, itemptr, "selection") {
01166             faceIndex = RNA_int_get(&itemptr, "face_index");
01167             elementIndex = RNA_int_get(&itemptr, "element_index");
01168             efa = EDBM_face_at_index(em, faceIndex);
01169             element = ED_uv_element_get(state->element_map, efa, BM_iter_at_index(NULL, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, efa, elementIndex));
01170             stitch_select_uv(element, state, 1);
01171         }
01172         RNA_END;
01173 
01174         EDBM_index_arrays_free(em);
01175         /* Clear the selection */
01176         RNA_collection_clear(op->ptr, "selection");
01177 
01178     }
01179     else {
01180         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01181             i = 0;
01182             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01183                 if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
01184                     UvElement *element = ED_uv_element_get(state->element_map, efa, l);
01185                     stitch_select_uv(element, state, 1);
01186                 }
01187                 i++;
01188             }
01189         }
01190     }
01191 
01192     /***** initialize static island preview data *****/
01193 
01194     state->tris_per_island = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*state->tris_per_island) * state->element_map->totalIslands,
01195                                          "stitch island tris");
01196     for (i = 0; i < state->element_map->totalIslands; i++) {
01197         state->tris_per_island[i] = 0;
01198     }
01199 
01200     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01201         UvElement *element = ED_uv_element_get(state->element_map, efa, BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(efa));
01202 
01203         if (element) {
01204             state->tris_per_island[element->island] += (efa->len > 2) ? efa->len - 2 : 0;
01205         }
01206     }
01207 
01208     if (!stitch_process_data(state, scene, 0)) {
01209         stitch_state_delete(state);
01210         return 0;
01211     }
01212 
01213     stitch_update_header(state, C);
01214     return 1;
01215 }
01216 
01217 static int stitch_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01218 {
01219     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01220     if (!stitch_init(C, op))
01221         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01222 
01223     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
01224     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, obedit->data);
01225     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01226 }
01227 
01228 static void stitch_exit(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, int finished)
01229 {
01230     StitchState *stitch_state;
01231     Scene *scene;
01232     SpaceImage *sima;
01233     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
01234     Object *obedit;
01235 
01236     scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01237     obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01238     sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
01239 
01240     stitch_state = (StitchState *)op->customdata;
01241 
01242     if (finished) {
01243         int i;
01244 
01245         RNA_float_set(op->ptr, "limit", stitch_state->limit_dist);
01246         RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "use_limit", stitch_state->use_limit);
01247         RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "snap_islands", stitch_state->snap_islands);
01248         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "static_island", stitch_state->static_island);
01249         RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "midpoint_snap", stitch_state->midpoints);
01250 
01251         /* Store selection for re-execution of stitch */
01252         for (i = 0; i < stitch_state->selection_size; i++) {
01253             PointerRNA itemptr;
01254             UvElement *element = stitch_state->selection_stack[i];
01255 
01256             RNA_collection_add(op->ptr, "selection", &itemptr);
01257 
01258             RNA_int_set(&itemptr, "face_index", BM_elem_index_get(element->face));
01259 
01260             RNA_int_set(&itemptr, "element_index", element->tfindex);
01261         }
01262 
01263 
01264         uvedit_live_unwrap_update(sima, scene, obedit);
01265     }
01266 
01267     if (sa)
01268         ED_area_headerprint(sa, NULL);
01269 
01270     DAG_id_tag_update(obedit->data, 0);
01271     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, obedit->data);
01272 
01273     stitch_state_delete(stitch_state);
01274     op->customdata = NULL;
01275 
01276     stitch_preview_delete();
01277 }
01278 
01279 
01280 static int stitch_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01281 {
01282     stitch_exit(C, op, 0);
01283     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01284 }
01285 
01286 
01287 static int stitch_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01288 {
01289     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01290 
01291     if (!stitch_init(C, op))
01292         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01293     if (stitch_process_data((StitchState *)op->customdata, scene, 1)) {
01294         stitch_exit(C, op, 1);
01295         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01296     }
01297     else {
01298         return stitch_cancel(C, op);
01299     }
01300 }
01301 
01302 static void stitch_select(bContext *C, Scene *scene, wmEvent *event, StitchState *stitch_state)
01303 {
01304     /* add uv under mouse to processed uv's */
01305     float co[2];
01306     NearestHit hit;
01307     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
01308     Image *ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
01309 
01310     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &co[0], &co[1]);
01311     uv_find_nearest_vert(scene, ima, stitch_state->em, co, NULL, &hit);
01312 
01313     if (hit.efa) {
01314         /* Add vertex to selection, deselect all common uv's of vert other
01315          * than selected and update the preview. This behavior was decided so that
01316          * you can do stuff like deselect the opposite stitchable vertex and the initial still gets deselected */
01317 
01318         /* This works due to setting of tmp in find nearest uv vert */
01319         UvElement *element = ED_uv_element_get(stitch_state->element_map, hit.efa, hit.l);
01320         stitch_select_uv(element, stitch_state, 0);
01321 
01322     }
01323 }
01324 
01325 static int stitch_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01326 {
01327     StitchState *stitch_state;
01328     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01329 
01330     stitch_state = (StitchState *)op->customdata;
01331 
01332     switch (event->type) {
01333         case MIDDLEMOUSE:
01334             return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
01335 
01336         /* Cancel */
01337         case ESCKEY:
01338             return stitch_cancel(C, op);
01339 
01340 
01341         case LEFTMOUSE:
01342             if (event->shift && (U.flag & USER_LMOUSESELECT)) {
01343                 if (event->val == KM_RELEASE) {
01344                     stitch_select(C, scene, event, stitch_state);
01345 
01346                     if (!stitch_process_data(stitch_state, scene, 0)) {
01347                         return stitch_cancel(C, op);
01348                     }
01349                 }
01350                 break;
01351             }
01352         case PADENTER:
01353         case RETKEY:
01354             if (stitch_process_data(stitch_state, scene, 1)) {
01355                 stitch_exit(C, op, 1);
01356                 return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01357             }
01358             else {
01359                 return stitch_cancel(C, op);
01360             }
01361 
01362         /* Increase limit */
01363         case PADPLUSKEY:
01364         case WHEELUPMOUSE:
01365             if (event->alt) {
01366                 stitch_state->limit_dist += 0.01;
01367                 if (!stitch_process_data(stitch_state, scene, 0)) {
01368                     return stitch_cancel(C, op);
01369                 }
01370                 break;
01371             }
01372             else {
01373                 return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
01374             }
01375         /* Decrease limit */
01376         case PADMINUS:
01377         case WHEELDOWNMOUSE:
01378             if (event->alt) {
01379                 stitch_state->limit_dist -= 0.01;
01380                 stitch_state->limit_dist = MAX2(0.01, stitch_state->limit_dist);
01381                 if (!stitch_process_data(stitch_state, scene, 0)) {
01382                     return stitch_cancel(C, op);
01383                 }
01384                 break;
01385             }
01386             else {
01387                 return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
01388             }
01389 
01390         /* Use Limit (Default off)*/
01391         case LKEY:
01392             if (event->val == KM_PRESS) {
01393                 stitch_state->use_limit = !stitch_state->use_limit;
01394                 if (!stitch_process_data(stitch_state, scene, 0)) {
01395                     return stitch_cancel(C, op);
01396                 }
01397                 break;
01398             }
01399             return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01400 
01401         case IKEY:
01402             if (event->val == KM_PRESS) {
01403                 stitch_state->static_island++;
01404                 stitch_state->static_island %= stitch_state->element_map->totalIslands;
01405 
01406                 if (!stitch_process_data(stitch_state, scene, 0)) {
01407                     return stitch_cancel(C, op);
01408                 }
01409                 break;
01410             }
01411             return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01412 
01413         case MKEY:
01414             if (event->val == KM_PRESS) {
01415                 stitch_state->midpoints = !stitch_state->midpoints;
01416                 if (!stitch_process_data(stitch_state, scene, 0)) {
01417                     return stitch_cancel(C, op);
01418                 }
01419             }
01420             break;
01421 
01422         /* Select geometry*/
01423         case RIGHTMOUSE:
01424             if (!event->shift) {
01425                 return stitch_cancel(C, op);
01426             }
01427             if (event->val == KM_RELEASE && !(U.flag & USER_LMOUSESELECT)) {
01428                 stitch_select(C, scene, event, stitch_state);
01429 
01430                 if (!stitch_process_data(stitch_state, scene, 0)) {
01431                     return stitch_cancel(C, op);
01432                 }
01433                 break;
01434             }
01435             return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01436 
01437         /* snap islands on/off */
01438         case SKEY:
01439             if (event->val == KM_PRESS) {
01440                 stitch_state->snap_islands = !stitch_state->snap_islands;
01441                 if (!stitch_process_data(stitch_state, scene, 0)) {
01442                     return stitch_cancel(C, op);
01443                 }
01444                 break;
01445             }
01446             else {
01447                 return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01448             }
01449 
01450         default:
01451             return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01452     }
01453 
01454     /* if updated settings, renew feedback message */
01455     stitch_update_header(stitch_state, C);
01456     ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
01457     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01458 }
01459 
01460 void UV_OT_stitch(wmOperatorType *ot)
01461 {
01462     PropertyRNA *prop;
01463 
01464     /* identifiers */
01465     ot->name = "Stitch";
01466     ot->description = "Stitch selected UV vertices by proximity";
01467     ot->idname = "UV_OT_stitch";
01468     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
01469     
01470     /* api callbacks */
01471     ot->invoke = stitch_invoke;
01472     ot->modal = stitch_modal;
01473     ot->exec = stitch_exec;
01474     ot->cancel = stitch_cancel;
01475     ot->poll = ED_operator_uvedit;
01476 
01477     /* properties */
01478     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "use_limit", 0, "Use Limit", "Stitch UVs within a specified limit distance");
01479     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "snap_islands", 1, "Snap Islands",
01480                     "Snap islands together (on edge stitch mode, rotates the islands too)");
01481 
01482     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "limit", 0.01f, 0.0f, FLT_MAX, "Limit",
01483                   "Limit distance in normalized coordinates", 0.0, FLT_MAX);
01484     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "static_island", 0, 0, INT_MAX, "Static Island",
01485                 "Island that stays in place when stitching islands", 0, INT_MAX);
01486     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "midpoint_snap", 0, "Snap At Midpoint",
01487                     "UVs are stitched at midpoint instead of at static island");
01488     prop = RNA_def_collection_runtime(ot->srna, "selection", &RNA_SelectedUvElement, "Selection", "");
01489     /* Selection should not be editable or viewed in toolbar */
01490     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_HIDDEN);
01491 }
